user_question: How can I improve my ability to lucid dream and use it for self-improvement?
final_answer: To improve your ability to lucid dream, practice reality checks, keep a dream journal, and use techniques like MILD and WBTB. For self-improvement, set clear intentions before sleep to explore personal growth topics during lucid dreams.

steps.content: To improve lucid dreaming, practice reality checks, keep a dream journal, and use techniques like MILD (Mnemonic Induction of Lucid Dreams) and WBTB (Wake Back To Bed). For self-improvement, set clear intentions before sleep to explore personal growth topics during lucid dreams.
